title: Zohran Mamdani Courts Chassidishe Voters
body: Rabbi Zohran Mamdani, a Muslim socialist, targets Brooklyn's frum community with a Yiddish ad, seeking to win over the chassidishe bloc in the NYC election.

title: Rabbi Assaulted by Police
body: Rabbi violently assaulted by officers in Bnei Brak while aiding a widow during an attempted demolition of her alleged illegal construction. Eyewitnesses claim one officer had no reason to attack.
